sentences.en: a young man drifting through life in an aimless way
sentences.cn: 一个浑浑噩噩度日的年轻人

sentences.en: After several hours of aimless searching they were getting low on fuel.
sentences.cn: 在几个小时漫无目的的搜寻之后，他们快没燃料了。

sentences.en: After this, Li Bai began his aimless wanderings all over the country.
sentences.cn: 以后,他漫游天下, 行踪不定.

sentences.en: As individuals, our personal decisions remain aimless or self - canceling.
sentences.cn: 作为个人, 我们本人的决定是无目标的,或者说 自我 取消的.

sentences.en: Can you look back and see a well-defined path, or simply an aimless series of job moves with no coherent structure?
sentences.cn: 回顾过去时能看到一条清晰的轨迹，还是只能看到一连串毫无目的、前后不连贯的工作经历？

sentences.en: Everyone felt aimless, with a kind of strained and aching relief.
sentences.cn: 人人感到惶惶然, 怀着一种不自然的和疼痛的慰籍.

sentences.en: He led an aimless sort of life.
sentences.cn: 他过着一种漫无目的的生活.

sentences.en: I love sitting about , having aimless conversations over tea.
sentences.cn: 我喜爱懒洋洋地闲坐着,喝着茶,漫无目的地闲谈.

sentences.en: I've heard her called a quitter for leaving and aimless wanderer.
sentences.cn: 在那儿,她又能推倒陈腐的围墙,树起全新的理念.

sentences.en: It is aimless to cast water into the sea.
sentences.cn: 投杯水于大海,徒劳无功.

sentences.en: Limited information is a always better than aimless drifting or operating completely in the dark.
sentences.cn: 有限的信息总比完全在黑暗中无目的模索要好得多.

sentences.en: Limited information is always better than aimless drifting or operating completely in the dark.
sentences.cn: 有限的信息总比完全在黑暗中无目的摸索要好得多.

sentences.en: People spend hours reading and writing aimless, tedious blogs.
sentences.cn: 人们花几个小时,阅读和写作不知所云 、 单调乏味的博客.

sentences.en: Peters had been adrift and aimless.
sentences.cn: 彼得斯曾经漫无目的地四处漂泊。

sentences.en: The sudden resolve had prompted her like superstitious impulse to abandon her aimless course.
sentences.cn: 这个决心就象一股迷信的冲动,敦促她放弃毫无目的的徘徊.

trans.tran_cn: 无目的的，无目标的，漫无目标
trans.tran_en: not having a clear purpose or reason
